# compactAppearance

**Instance Property**

The appearance settings for a compact-height navigation bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var compactAppearance: UINavigationBarAppearance? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If the value of this property is `nil`, UIKit uses the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationItem/standardAppearance] of the item stored in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationBar/topItem] property. You can customize the compact appearance for specific navigation items with the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationItem/compactAppearance] property of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationItem].

## Customizing the bar’s appearance

- **prefersLargeTitles**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the title displays in a large format.
- **standardAppearance**: The appearance settings for a standard-height navigation bar.
- **scrollEdgeAppearance**: The appearance settings for the navigation bar when the edge of scrollable content aligns with the edge of the navigation bar.
- **compactScrollEdgeAppearance**: The appearance settings for a compact-height navigation bar when the edge of scrollable content aligns with the edge of the navigation bar.
- **isTranslucent**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the navigation bar is translucent.
- **Legacy customizations**: Customize appearance information directly on the navigation bar object.
